titleStmt.title: Orders set down by the Lord Provost, bailiffs, and Council of Edinburgh, to be observed by the constables thereof, in discharge of their offices within this city, and liberties thereof.
titleStmt.author: Edinburgh (Scotland). Town Council.
McLeod, Æneas.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by the heir of Andrew Anderson, Printer to his most sacred Majesty, city, and colledge,

notesStmt.note: Arms of the city of Edinburgh at head of text.
Signed at end: Æneas M Leod, cls.
Reproduction of the original in the National Library of Scotland.

person.persName: his most sacred Majesty, city, and colledge
